item.title: How Every Snow White Character Looks In Live-Action vs Animation
item.description: Disney has brought another of its animated classics to life with a live-action remake of Snow White, but how do each of the main characters compare?

item.title: 10 Best College Rom-Com Movies Ever Made
item.description: The growing pains and newfound independence earned during one's college years go hand-in-hand with some of the best love stories in film.

item.title: Robert De Niro's New Gangster Movie Continues His Rough Year 4 Weeks After Disappointing Netflix Show
item.description: Robert De Niro's new gangster movie, The Alto Knights, is the second of his projects to receive a "rotten" score on Rotten Tomatoes this year.
